chunks.markdown: <::logo: THE FREE PRESS THE FREE PRESS A Division of Simon & Schuster • 866 Third Avenue, New York, NY 10022 The logo features a stylized "FP" monogram enclosed in a double-lined rectangular box, positioned to the left of the main text. ::>
Please send me ___ copy(ies) of: **THE TRUE STATE OF THE PLANET** Ronald Bailey, Editor 1995 ISBN: 0-02-874010-6 $12.00 paper

F0267 option Enclosed is my check or money order for $: [ ] (Drawn on a U.S. Bank and made payable to Simon & Schuster) Charge my: option Visa: [ ] option Mastercard: [ ] option American Express: [ ] Card No. ___ Exp. Date ___ Signature ___ Phone # ___ (Required for credit card orders) option Bill my firm*: [ ] PO # ___ (Individuals Must Prepay)
**SHIP TO:** Name: ___ Institution: ___ Address: ___ City: ___ State: ___ Zip: ___

NOTES: * If you elect to send a check, please add appropriate sales tax—required in all states except AK, DE, MT, NH and OR. * There are no shipping and handling charges for individuals paying by check. * Credit card payments are processed when your order is shipped. * Forthcoming books will be shipped when published.
Prices good in U.S. only. Prices and availability are subject to change without notice.

<::attestation: Postal markings Postage applied, mailed Readable Text (main content): Mail To: The Free Press Attn: John McCrory 866 Third Avenue New York, NY 10022 Faint, illegible postal markings are present in the upper right corner of an address label.::>
<::logo: The Free Press For credit card orders, call The Free Press TOLL FREE: 1-800-323-7445 A black and white illustration of an old-fashioned rotary telephone is depicted.::>

For prompt order processing, call between 9 am and 5 pm, Eastern Time. We accept Visa, Master Card, or American Express for payment. Please have card number and expiration date ready when placing your order, and refer to the Promo Key in the circle.

<::logo: Visa VISA A black rectangular card with a white stripe and the text "VISA".::> <::logo: MasterCard MasterCard A black rectangular card with the text "MasterCard" and two overlapping circles.::> <::logo: Generic Card (No readable text) A black rectangular card with a circular symbol in the center.::>
Significant discounts are available for bulk purchases, starting with as few as ten copies. For discount information, call the Free Press Special Sales Hotline at:
<::logo: Educational/Academic Context Attention Professors: A black graduation cap with a tassel is positioned to the left of the text.::>

Examination copies are available on 60-day approval basis only. Simply place your request on university stationery indicating book, course title, projected enrollment, current text, and date by which your next text decision is due.
Mail to: The Free Press Attn: Exam Copy Dept. 866 Third Avenue New York, NY 10022
